original_title: Причастие. Рыбацкие бабы. Тандава средней полосы
overview: Metaphysical fantasy in the genre of a documentary myth about the inscrutability of the layers of secret Russia. The inhabitants of secret Russia complete the autumn rituals. Straw Shiva, a cult figure of the syncretic pantheon, performs a fire dance.
title: Tandava of the Middle lane. Part "The Hare and the Pumpkin"
